page.title: 09A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Today my class is having language.This lasts until 10.40, break! At 11.00 we have mental arithmetic, spelling, and swimming. In arithmetic we have ten sums to do in our heads, this ties in with spelling. We have fifteen words a-week to learn at home. We have swimming after this, the time now is 11.30. In swimming we practise our strokes, or, as some prefer, certain people stand outside the headmasters office! "Lunch now", it is 12.00 am, there are ten classes for dinner, my class can be first or last for dinner. When our dinner is eaten we go outside. I have sandwiches so I spend little time in the dinner hall. When we go back in for lessons it is 1.30 pm, and time for geography and at the moment we are studying the E.E.C.(European Economic Community) It is extremely boring.
